name: PANASONIC EUROPE LTD
goal:
- Ensure that Panasonic is up-to-date with EU initiatives

interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:

- EGA environmental goods agreement
- ITA information technology agreement

- Copyright Levies
- Audivisual policy
- Data Protection
- Spectrum policy
- Cyber security
- Consumers issues
- Market surveillance for lighting
- Big data

- Patents
- eAccessibility
- Energy and Environmental issues
